title: Motion Matching Female Locomotion Set
description: Female Motion Matching animations for non-strafe locomotion - perfect for indie creators, studios, and enthusiasts!
longDescription:
📢Before making a purchase, carefully read the description and visit all the links📢


📖 DOCUMENTATION LINK

🎥 VIDEO EXAMPLE OF IMPLEMENTATION


These animations have not been tested on the latest motion matching system released in version 5.4. Before purchasing, I encourage you to do further research on how motion matching works.
In the near future, I will try to test these animations, but until then, you are purchasing these animations at your own risk and willingness to test.
Currently, I recommend using Motion Matching Female Locomotion Set only for the Motion Symphony plugin.


We present a set of Female Motion Matching animations aimed at independent creators, indie studios, and enthusiasts of the motion matching system. Created based on the requirements posed by motion matching, as well as utilizing available information and our years of experience. With our animations, you'll be able to create non-strafe locomotion in an intuitive way.


Package does not include animations for creating strafe locomotion.

Please note that this is not a plug-and-play system, and the results depend on understanding what Motion Matching is and the system that supports it..

Please be aware that this is not a plug-and-play system and the outcomes are contingent upon comprehending what Motion Matching is and the corresponding system that supports it.


Our animations have been tested using the Motion Symphony plugin available on the Unreal Engine Marketplace.


We want the product to be of the highest quality, and we want you to be as satisfied as possible. So if something isn't working or if you have any questions, please ask them on Discord or in the question section. We are also available via email.


🗣️ DISCORD

🌐 VANILLA LOOP WEBSITE
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • The animations are categorized as Idle, Walk, Jog, Run, Additional, and Shuffle
  •  Documentation along with dance cards.
  •  Animations retargeted for two Unreal skeletons. 

Rigged to Epic skeleton: Yes

If rigged to the Epic skeleton, IK bones are included: Yes, (SK_Mannequin UE4 & SK_Mannequin UE5)

Number of Animations: 83 (166, both skeletons)

Animation types: Root Motion

Number of Characters: 2, (SK_Mannequin UE4 & SK_Mannequin UE5)

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Source files available in the project.

Documentation: DOCUMENTATION LINK
